scripts.test:integration: pnpm exec concurrently --names 'mock,test' --success command-test --kill-others 'pnpm:mock' 'env-cmd -f ./.env.integration start-server-and-test start http://localhost:3000 "test:integration:run"'
scripts.test:integration:watch:run: pnpm exec concurrently --names 'mock,test' --kill-others 'pnpm:mock' 'env-cmd -f ./.env.integration start-server-and-test dev http://localhost:3000 "pnpm nodemon -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss --ignore \"__test__/**\" --exec \"pnpm test:integration:run\""'
scripts.test:integration:watch:open: pnpm exec concurrently --names 'mock,test' --kill-others 'pnpm:mock' 'env-cmd -f ./.env.integration start-server-and-test dev http://localhost:3000 "pnpm nodemon -e js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,scss --ignore \"__test__/**\" --exec \"pnpm test:integration:open\""'
